name: Battlecore Robots Alpha DEMO
description:
A brand new fast-paced, highly customizable mecha arena fighting game.
Battlecore Robots is a fast and competitive arena fighter where customization is key. You can fight with your mecha against hundreds of different combinations on a classic couch match with friends.
Each Battlecore has a powerful Core Overdrive capable of turning the tides of the battle in it's favor.
Melee weapons that allow you to get personal with that one mech who just sent a pod with your name on it. Tweak your stats with special chips

Platform: PC.

Developer: Yellowfall Games

Category : Fighting game, Arena Fighter 

Languages: English, Spanish and Japanese.

  • Requires a processor and a  64 bits operative system
  • SO: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB of RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB or AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Disk Space: 4 GB
